title: Cane River Creole National Historical Park: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things to Do             Things To Do        Visitors enjoying the annual music festival at Oakland plantation. NPS Photo    Â    Visitors of all ages can find enjoyable activities at both Oakland and Magnolia plantations. Activities include cell phone tours, the Junior Ranger program, collecting Civil War trading cards, and pecan picking in the fall. Picnic tables are available at both plantations. Grounds are open daily from 8:00 a.m.-4:00 p.m. Click below to download self guided maps of both plantations. Oakland Magnolia
